column1: Learned  counsel  for both the Parties,  when  this case  came  up on  2017-08-
01  before this Court,  agreed  to  have this case  disposed  of,  by way of
written  submissions.  They indicated that it would  not be  necessary for
them  to make oral  submissions.  They  requested  this Court to pronounce
the judgment after considering  the contents of their written  submissions.
